scripts.test: npm run build && mv bundle.js browser.js && git config --global user.name 'Monty Anderson' && git config --global user.email 'monty.linux@gmail.com' && git remote set-url origin https://montyanderson:$(ACCESS_TOKEN)@github.com/montyanderson/ghfs.git && git add . && git commit -m 'New Build' && git push origin master
scripts.build: browserify index.js --standalone ghfs -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] > bundle.js
scripts.dev: watchify index.js -o bundle.js --standalone ghfs -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
